name: Fast Break Free Throws TV Edition
name_original: Fast Break Free Throws TV Edition
description:
Welcome basketball fans! Fast Break Free Throws is a simple, fun and addictive 3D free throw shooting basketball game with realistic physics.

How to Play:
1. Pull back on the ball like a slingshot to adjust the power and angle
2. Tap on remote to launch the ball
3. Shoot until you have run out of balls

Game Features:
- Easy controls that are fun for all ages
- 3D Environments
- Works with remote and gamepad
